quoteText: You can choose not to provide certain information, but then you might not be able to take advantage of many of our features. We use the information that you provide for such purposes as responding to your requests, customizing future shopping for you, improving our stores, and communicating with you.
title: Amazon allows users to have some control over the information that they give to the service

tosdr.case: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
tosdr.tldr: While Amazon grants users some control over their personal information, the service also warns that users may sacrifice quality of experience on the website if they limit the information that they give.
